message.content: {"given_definition_quality":55,"better_definition":"China (the country)","sentence":"我爱中国。","image_prompt":"Create an animation still in the soft apocalypse style of a child holding a small red flag with a yellow star, smiling and standing in a vast open space with vague, dreamlike buildings in the background, suggesting China. The scene should be gentle, warm, with a subtle post-apocalyptic tone but full of hope and innocence, soft lighting, and muted pastel colors.","sentence_translation":"I love China."}
